citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on
14April2021. The inspector arrived at 11:00 am. No one answered the front door. The inspector called and left a message
on the home phone. The mobile phone was not in service. Inspector waited 30 minutes then departed premises at 11:30
am.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on 
14April2021. The inspector arrived at 11:00 am. No one answered the front door. The inspector called and left a message 
on the home phone. The mobile phone was not in service.   Inspector waited 30 minutes then departed premises at 11:30 
am. 
 
 
 
End Section
